Workflow.Name: SetupWizard>RunInitialFlows
Workflow.Description: This flow is triggered from the Setup Wizard and runs the flows required for the initial setup of the core components: Admin \| Sync Template v3 CoE Solution Metadata, Admin \| Sync Template v3 Configure Emails, Admin \| Sync Template v3 (Connectors)
Workflow.BillingContext: [{"id":"admin_CoESetupWizardPreview","type":"UnifiedApp","metadata":{"displayName":"CoE Setup and Upgrade Wizard"}},{"id":"admin_SetupWIzardARMFeatures","type":"UnifiedApp","metadata":{"displayName":"Setup WIzard - ARM Features"}}]

Description.description: This flow is triggered from the Setup Wizard and runs the flows required for the initial setup of the core components: Admin \| Sync Template v3 CoE Solution Metadata, Admin \| Sync Template v3 Configure Emails, Admin \| Sync Template v3 (Connectors)
